safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.name: Safety For EOT Crane
safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.tagline: Advanced safety and automation system for overload prevention and accident control.
safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.overview: The Safe Load Indicator (SLI) is an advanced safety and automation system designed for EOT Cranes to prevent overload, instability, and unsafe lifting conditions. The system continuously monitors critical parameters and provides real-time visual and audible alerts, ensuring operator safety, crane protection, and compliance with safety standards.
keyFeatures: Single Unified Display: Real-time load data for main and auxiliary hooks.
Multi-Load Monitoring: Independent readouts for multi-hook configurations.
Wi-Fi Access Point: Wireless calibration without software installation.
Mobile Friendly: Responsive web interface for adjustments via phone/tablet.

calibrationSetup.title: Seamless Setup & Smart Control
calibrationSetup.description: The SLI system features a built-in Wi-Fi Access Point, enabling wireless calibration and configuration. All adjustments are performed via a secure, mobile-friendly web page.
steps: Tilt Angle Setup: 'Angle Reset' button instantly sets current angle as 0°.
Multi-Load Calibration: Supports up to 8 independent load points for precision.
Safety Configuration: Input boxes for Load, Tilt, Wind, and Rope slack limits.
Toggling Options: Interface buttons to enable/disable safety parameters.

safetyParameters.title: Overload Protection (OVLD)
safetyParameters.description: Automatic hoist cutoff during overload. Displays 'OVLD' and triggers buzzer.

safetyParameters.title: Anti-Tilt Protection (ATP)
safetyParameters.description: Triggers at ±5°. Displays 'ATP' and prevents instability.

safetyParameters.title: Rope Slack Protection
safetyParameters.description: Detects slack to prevent load drops and mechanical stress.

safetyParameters.title: Error Indication System
safetyParameters.description: ERR 1 (Comm issue) Quick fault identification.

safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.name: Gantry Crane Safety
safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.tagline: Heavy-duty stability and wind speed monitoring for industrial gantry systems.
safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.overview: The Safe Load Indicator (SLI) is an advanced safety and automation system designed for Gantry Cranes to prevent overload, instability, and unsafe lifting conditions. It includes an Anemometer for wind speed monitoring, essential for outdoor gantry operations. The system ensures compliance and maximum operator safety.
keyFeatures: Anemometer Integration: Real-time wind velocity measurement and auto-cutoff.
Single Unified Display: Real-time load data for main and auxiliary hooks.
Wi-Fi Access Point: Wireless calibration via mobile/tablet/laptop.
Multi-Load Monitoring: High-precision support for multi-hook cranes.

calibrationSetup.title: Seamless Setup & Smart Control
calibrationSetup.description: The SLI system features a built-in Wi-Fi Access Point, enabling wireless calibration. Includes specialized Wind Speed limit settings and Angle Reset for outdoor stability.
steps: Tilt Angle Setup: Instant 0° calibration for ground stability.
Wind Speed Config: Input safe limits for automatic high-wind shutdown.
Multi-Load Calibration: Up to 8 points for diverse lifting ranges.
Wireless Sync: Full control via mobile-friendly web interface.

safetyParameters.title: Overload Protection (OVLD)
safetyParameters.description: Automatic cutoff with buzzer alert and 'OVLD' display indicator.

safetyParameters.title: Wind Speed Monitoring
safetyParameters.description: Auto-cutoff when wind velocity exceeds safe operational limits.

safetyParameters.title: Anti-Tilt Protection (ATP)
safetyParameters.description: Monitors angular tilt (±5°) to prevent tipping or instability.

safetyParameters.title: Error Indication (ERR)
safetyParameters.description: Visual LED codes (ERR 1/2) for rapid sensors/comm diagnosis.

safe-load-indicator-tower-crane.name: Safe Load Indicator – Tower Crane
safe-load-indicator-tower-crane.overview: Our SLI for Tower Cranes provides radius-based capacity calculation and overload prevention. Essential for high-rise construction where reach and vertical stability are critical.

safetyParameters.title: Radius Limiter
safetyParameters.description: Prevents excessive reach beyond load capacity.

safetyParameters.title: Wind Velocity
safetyParameters.description: Safe operation limits for narrow structures.

safetyParameters.title: Angle Accuracy

safetyParameters.title: Hoist Cut-Off
safetyParameters.description: Stops winch operation immediately on limit.

safe-load-indicator-telescopic-crane.name: Safe Load Indicator – Telescopic Crane
safe-load-indicator-telescopic-crane.overview: Automated capacity monitoring for telescopic cranes. Dynamically tracks boom length and angle to calculate safe lifting limits across all extension stages.

safetyParameters.title: Tip-Over Prevention

safe-load-indicator-pick-and-carry-crane.name: Safe Load Indicator – Pick & Carry Crane

safe-load-indicator-tipper-truck.overview: Advanced payload monitoring and tipping safety for heavy dump trucks and tippers. Prevents overloading and ensures chassis stability during discharge operations in mines and construction sites.
